name: caricaturist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who creates caricatures (= humorous drawings or descriptions that make someone's most noticeable features even more noticeable): A fine caricaturist, he prefers to work in acrylics. He worked as a caricaturist and opened a studio and gallery. See
caricature
More examplesFewer examplesA caricaturist will turn a person’s potato nose or jug ears into the dominant feature in the portrait.At the annual festival there is the chance to see cartoonists and caricaturists at work.She had to contend with aggressive newspaper caricaturists who made the most of her hairstyles.
